snippet: Yoshiyahu Pinto, who is a figure in the federal inquiry into the campaign finances of Representative Michael G. Grimm, has been put under house arrest in Israel in a bribery and money-laundering investigation there.
abstract: Rabbi Yoshiyahu Pinto, a figure in federal inquiry into the campaign finances of Rep Michael G Grimm of Staten Island, is put under house arrest in Israel in a bribery and money-laundering investigation there.
lead_paragraph: Yoshiyahu Pinto, who is a figure in the federal inquiry into the campaign finances of Representative Michael G. Grimm, has been put under house arrest in Israel in a bribery and money-laundering investigation there.

headline.seo: Rabbi Pinto, Fund-Raiser for Grimm, Under House Arrest in Israel
headline.main: Rabbi Linked to Campaign Inquiry Is Questioned in Israeli Bribe Case
headline.print_headline: Rabbi Linked to Campaign Inquiry Is Questioned in Israeli Bribe Case
